REGISTRE.TITLE: Sign In
REGISTRE.SUBTITLE: Create your account
REGISTRE.ERROR1: Username must have between 3 and 20 characters
REGISTRE.ERROR3: Username can only have alphanumeric characters
REGISTRE.ERROR5: Password must be at least 8 characters long
REGISTRE.ERROR6: Password must contain at least a lower case letter, a capital letter and a number
REGISTRE.ALERTINCORRECTE: There are form fields that are incorrect or not complete
REGISTRE.ALERTERRORSERVER: There was a problem in creating your new profile

RECUPERAR.MESSAGE1: Password sent to the given address, if you have not received the email, repeat the process and make sure the mail is correct
RECUPERAR.MESSAGE2: The email entered does not exist
